user_input: Modify the H2\Gas Pipeline\Capacities_H2_Year_FID+PCI+PMI.csv file and set all values, which aren’t 0, to 999. Name the new file Pipeline\Capacities_H2_Year_FID+PCI+PMI_UNLMITED.csv
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren’t 0 to 999

tasks.description: Open and modify the file 'H2\Gas Pipeline\Capacities_H2_Year_FID+PCI+PMI.csv' by setting all values that are not 0 to 999, and save the modified data in a new file adding UNLIMITED as an extension.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.
